form.name: breastfeeds_less_than_8_times_in_24_hours
form.page_subtitle: PNC Diagnostic Newborn: Feeding Problems, Low Weight for Age> Breastfeeds less than 8 Times in 24 Hours

field.name: Breastfeeds < 8 Times in 24 Hours | Take Action
Advise mother to increase frequency of feeding
Advise mother to breastfeed as often and as long as the baby wants, day & night
Advise mother to give home care for baby
Follow up with mother and her baby in 2 days
